hymn.title: And He showed me a river

layout.singingstanza: And He showed me a riv -- er Of wat -- er of life, Bright as crys -- tal, Pro -- ceed -- ing out Of the throne of God And of the Lamb. And Thou shalt make them to drink Of the riv -- er of Thy plea -- sures.

lyrics.stanza: And He showed me a river Of water of life, Bright as crystal, Proceeding out Of the throne of God And of the Lamb. And Thou shalt make them to drink Of the river of Thy pleasures.
There is a river, The streams whereof make glad. The city of God. She shall not be moved. God shall help her. God's in her midst. They shall be abundantly satisfied With the fatness of Thy house.
